question: You would like to work overseas, write a letter to an employment agency. Write:- • What job you would like to apply • What companies are you looking for? • Why do you want to work overseas?
text: I am writing this letter with reference to your recent advertisement in the local employment newspaper, searching for an automation engineer in the cloud computing domain with hands-on experience in Toronto city Canada. I consider my credentials exactly suit the IT analyst role requirement. So, I have attached my CV for this job.

Firstly, I have around 8 years of experience as an automation specialist in a plethora of domains. I have a specialization in artificial intelligence and certified tester in cloud computing as well. In addition to this, I worked for an E-commerce organization and I got a good opportunity to deep dive myself into user interface applications and back-end servers.

Secondly, I am predominantly looking for top multinational companies mainly in the banking or telecom sector. My skill set and competencies are majorly in these domains only. Furthermore, I want to pursue  cloud computing courses and which are highly demanded in Canada. So, I would like to work overseas. So that, I can explore myself and get great insight into the latest technologies.
should you have any concerns or further clarifications, please do not hesitate to contact me.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
